snippet: CHESTLER--Rita. My dearest most precious friend. You will forever be in my heart. You fought so valiantly never complaining. Herbie, my deepest sympathy and condolences. Her life was devoted to her wonderful, loving, and caring children and grandc...
lead_paragraph: CHESTLER--Rita. My dearest most precious friend. You will forever be in my heart. You fought so valiantly never complaining. Herbie, my deepest sympathy and condolences. Her life was devoted to her wonderful, loving, and caring children and grandchildren, Caroline and Steve, Kathy, and John, Rhonda and Danny, Gregory, Caitlin, Jaclyn, and Andrew, Jacob, Jessica, and Emily. She was very special to all who knew her and loved her. With love, Gail Siegal and family 1/3
